features.name: Migrate from npm to pnpm
features.description: Migrate the project's package manager from npm to pnpm for faster installs, better disk space efficiency, and stricter dependency management. This includes updating all documentation and CI/CD configurations.
verification: pnpm-lock.yaml file created in project root
node_modules directory removed and reinstalled with pnpm
All npm scripts work correctly with pnpm (pnpm run dev, pnpm run build, etc.)
Build succeeds with pnpm run build
CLAUDE.md updated with pnpm commands instead of npm
.gitignore updated to ignore pnpm-specific files if needed
All dependencies install successfully with pnpm install
